scenes.title: Scene 1: Impact
scenes.speaker: SYSTEM
scenes.body: Asteroid shower incoming. Hull integrity collapsing. Navigation offline.

choices.text: Seal cockpit bulkhead and attempt emergency landing
Transmit final message and hold course

scenes.title: Emergency Descent
scenes.speaker: NARRATOR
scenes.body: You seal the cockpit, but power reroutes into control systems. You lose fine control and crash-land on the planet. You and your partner lock oxygen masks and brace for impact.

scenes.title: System Collapse
scenes.speaker: NARRATOR
scenes.body: You divert power, but the system shorts. The ship enters uncontrolled freefall. Structural failure becomes total. You do not survive.

scenes.title: Last Broadcast
scenes.speaker: PLAYER 1
scenes.body: This is Ship... we have lost full control. We are crash-landing on the planet. This may be our last message. We hold course as systems fail. The screen goes dark.

scenes.title: Scene 2: Wreckage
scenes.speaker: SYSTEM
scenes.body: You wake in twisted metal and silence. Your partner is missing. Wind scrapes across the wreck. One oxygen canister remains.

choices.text: Follow the distress beacon into the canyon
Stay near the ship and conserve oxygen

scenes.title: Ending: Signal Found
scenes.speaker: SYSTEM
scenes.body: You find signs your partner survived. A faint beacon pulses in the storm. Hope returns.

scenes.title: Ending: Containment Failure
scenes.speaker: SYSTEM
scenes.body: You wait too long in the wreckage. Oxygen runs out. The planet goes dark.

scenes.title: Scene 3: Alien
scenes.speaker: ALIEN
scenes.body: Someone you love deeply holds a belief you find abhorrent. To truly save them from it, would you:

choices.text: Break their heart, turn them against you, and force upon them a painful truth.
You allow them to remain happily wrong.

scenes.title: Scene 3: Alien
scenes.speaker: ALIEN
scenes.body: Your partner is closer to it. If you sabotage them, your claim is secure. They would never know it was you. Is your professional camaraderie stronger than your desire to succeed?

scenes.title: Scene 3: Alien
scenes.speaker: ALIEN
scenes.body: I watched your coworker enter my domain. They spoke of you. They believed you would hesitate in the final moment, that your moral squeamishness made you weak. Does this change your desire to find them?

scenes.title: Scene 3: Alien
scenes.speaker: ALIEN
scenes.body: I will let you go further and find the gem but your working partner will die the moment you see it. Will you accept?

choices.text: No. Even if they think I am weak. I refuse to let them die. I care about them too much and my herat is too soft to eveb think of a momnet where i willingly let harm come to them. Even if it is at the cost of my own life, it is a choice that I make.

Yes….Its unfortunate…and i think I will regret this decision for the rest of my life..but I cant do this anymore..the fighting,..the pain..the choices that i hae had to make..maybe there is a change where i can succeed..and isnt that what they would want for me?

scenes.title: Ending
scenes.speaker: Alien
scenes.body: ...a hard choice..and yet one that you made for the sake of your partner.. For a chance forr them to be happy. You have chosen the right answer it was a hard choice..and yet it was also the one made from your heart and not from ill intentions. This proves that you are of pure heart. You may go forth. I do warn you what you find ahead may not be what you wish to see. But if you step across this boundary you may not return. If you go back death is also certain.
